subject: Automobile Racing
Automobile Safety Features and Defects
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar hoped for buzz about its new racecars, but the season’s recurring themes have been safety for drivers and fans, and penalties, fines and appeals.
snippet: Nascar hoped for buzz about its new racecars, but the season’s recurring themes have been safety for drivers and fans, and penalties, fines and appeals.
